description: To address the issue associated with the CVE-2023-4863, users should update to Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 116.0.1938.81 or later. The update package can be accessed through the Microsoft Store, which automatically updates affected customers. For alternate updates, customers can manually download the version 1.0.62681.0 or later for the WebP image extension and Teams versions 1.6.00.26474 and 1.6.00.26463. This ensures that the products are no longer vulnerable to the identified heap buffer overflow issue.
